eprllib.PreProcess package¶

Submodules¶

eprllib.PreProcess.IDFProperties module¶

This module is used to load an IDF file and recognize the content of the file related with the agents that would be used in the eprllib library.

occupancy_profile()[source]¶

This function defines the occupancy profile of the user. For that, it read the occupancy profile from the file allocated on eprllib.ExampleFiles.users and apply then a random modification based on stadistics.
